extendedInfo.description: THE OFFICIAL BLOONSÂ® TD 4 HAS ARRIVED ON THE ANDROID MARKET!The monkeys are getting serious and are ready to take down the enemy from the land, air and sea in the style of classic tower defense. Utilising a ranking system you can build up your experience and gain access to powerful towers and upgrades. Call in mortar strikes, deploy the monkey aces and harness the power of banana farms as you bid to take down the enemy in true bloon popping fashion.BloonsÂ® TD 4 Android features a mix of classic tracks from the online game as well as a whole host of new tracks for you to master. The medal ranking system adds an extra level of difficulty to the challenge. Can you battle through all 75 rounds to earn the gold medal?Of course, even if you do, the fun doesn't stop there and you can continue the madness in freeplay mode. Discover how many rounds can you survive before the enemy overpowers you. BloonsÂ® TD 4 has some special bonuses which you can discover and unlock by mastering the tracks!Features:-â¢ All of your BloonsÂ® TD 4 favourites, including the all powerful Sun God.â¢ 15 different tracks.â¢ 3 difficulty settings on each map, Easy, Medium and Hard for varying degrees of challenge.â¢ Continue the popping frenzy in freeplay mode once you master a track.â¢ Special bonus unlocks.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Excellent game play, awesome variety, and hundreds of awesome bloon popping hours. It was made by ninja kiwi, so it has to be awesome,  right? EXPECT BTD5 FOR ANDROID THIS NOVEMBER!!!!!!!!!! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great flash port
reviews.comment: This game is arguably even more fun now that you can take it anywhere. One of the most polished tower defense games on the market
reviews.author: Dan Haney

reviews.title: One of the BEST!
reviews.comment: This is an incredibly awesome game and it dosnt take long to load up. I recommend it to everybody, but i want to know: when is the fifth one going to come to android? And now that we are talking about new games,, are you going to put zombie assault tower defense for android? Please reply! Thank you!
reviews.author: William Macomber

reviews.title: Expecting to be faster
reviews.comment: Very fun game. But it is really irritating to see it slows down whenever there is a mess of bloons. I am expecting this app to utilise all the processor cores because it is very cpu demanding. Sadly this game is most likely single threaded, hope the future it will use all the cores available, I know it is hard but please made it possible...
reviews.author: Classisisimo Tertain-ment

reviews.title: Very very good
reviews.comment: Just needs a counter that shows you how many more bloons to pop until next level. Its amazing it runs on this optimus p500. Very handy that when u  move to sd card its only 888kb!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bloons Td 4
reviews.comment: Love the game but have purchased the extreme maps 3 times & still don\'t have them. Emailed several times with no response. Give me the maps or a refund n ill give u more stars lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hoorah!
reviews.comment: I love BTD 4 and now I get to play it on the go! I can\'t wait until BTD5 comes to android.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Very fun or entertaining to play with and veryyyyyy spectacular!!!
reviews.author: orchid lee

reviews.title: Little lag
reviews.comment: Little lag but that is cuz at level 106 there is alot of bloons Game has crashed and not working for me dont buy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but
reviews.comment: The new tower is two million? Thats gonna take forever. But other than that its awsome.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun but a major drawback
reviews.comment: This is a fun app, but I give it 2 stars because I was able to BEAT THE ENTIRE GAME in one round. I would recommend btd5 instead of this because it is possible to beat the game in one round in btd4
reviews.author: Daniel Rosen

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Love this game and play it a ton online. When will Blaine tower defense 5 be on android? Edit. It came out and I got it. Its better than this so I am going to uninstall this. This still is an awesome game.
reviews.author: neil stefanyk

reviews.title: Blank
reviews.comment: Blank screen when I try to play, it won\'t go to the home screen. Please fix. HTC sensation 4G
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t play without internet connection.
reviews.comment: I cancelled my data today and now game will not start. Error message pops up about unable to verify license, test internet connection.
reviews.author: Robert Uehara

reviews.title: Buggy
reviews.comment: On Galaxy III is buggy.  When call comes in and you go back to game screen is messed up and you can\'t exit.  Have to restart.
reviews.author: David Williams

reviews.title: Best Game Ever (updated review)
reviews.comment: After all these updates, flawless. Using Samsung GS2 Tmobile. Playing it is awesome, and just so much fun. All my suggestions added, now matches apple version well. No force closing. Only an issue with locking the phone in game, and coming back in... Colors get messed up. Always happy to see more updates. Thanks!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Didn\'t load!
reviews.comment: Game came up with a black screen and reverted back to home screen,
reviews.author: James Grocutt

reviews.title: Cristian
reviews.comment: This game is addincting but it literally murders your battery to death.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cars and selling them
reviews.comment: This game is great but if their was more cars. Also why can\'t I sell a car I have. Both of these are problems that need to be fixed. Also it freezes my phone alot you should put a graphics quality adjuster on the app. Please and thanks.
reviews.author: Nicholas underwood

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I love this game. Just wish that it had 3 things - 1. Multiple save game slots 2. Wish it wasn\'t such a memory hog and 3. When is Bloons TD5 going to be available for Android?
reviews.author: A Google User
